title: BIG Problem
body: League won't open it says there is a problem windows will try to find a solution and i know it's league it's not my computer!

replies.body:
Hmm...this definitely isn't something we normally see.  In an effort to help out a bit further, could you link a screenshot of the exact error you see?  Also, when do you see this error exactly?  Is it when you first try to immediately open League?

Let me know!
I already figured out how to open league without the problem coming up
Can you try running League of Legends as an administrator (right-click the League of Legends icon and select "Run as Administrator" and let me know if that opens up the client?
I figured that out and it worked
IT'S BEEN A YEAR MANG! WHERE'VE YA BEEN?
I totally forgot about league till a month ago or so

So, something that can happen to me (and this may not be your problem, you are a bit vague) but there will be an instance of the game open in the background that I can't see preventing me from opening a new one. I need to cntrl-alt-delete and manually close the other instance. Again, my not be your problem, but thought I'd try to help anyway.
